0.1.name: wordpress/google-1
0.1.description:
Add the new Google +1 button to your WordPress site. Also available as a shortcode.

Simply install the plugin and follow the instructions on the Settings page.

  • Google +1 Plugin homepage.
  • More WordPress Plugins.

You can also insert the comment box as a shortcode into any post, page or template and use your own settings for each time you do it! Simply use the shortcode [google+1]
